tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sculptures (
  sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  creation_year INT,
  materials VARCHAR(255),
  provenance TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Provenance (
    provenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    provenance_notes TEXT,
    acquisition_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES Sculpture(sculpture_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    creation_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE collections (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_name VARCHAR(255),
    collection_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE provenance (
    provenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    collection_id INT,
    provenance_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year_created INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    nationality VARCHAR(255),
    birth_year INT,
    death_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE provenance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    previous_owner VARCHAR(255),
    current_owner VARCHAR(255),
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name TEXT,
    artist_name TEXT,
    creation_year INT,
    material TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    country TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Artists (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name TEXT,
    birth_year INT,
    nationality TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Collections (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collection_name TEXT,
    creation_year INT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SculptureHistory (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_id INT,
    event_type TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    description TEXT
)
